system.description: Your bonded artifact is a suit of armor, outfit, article of clothing, or an item that is otherwise worn. While wearing your bonded artifact you are magically protected and your armor class equals 10 + your spellcasting ability modifier + your proficiency bonus. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit. In addition, you add the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.nlto7z4j14ips45w]{Shield} to your list of known wielder spells.
